author: Syllad | The Rising Meghalaya
title: OIL, BPCL join hands to roll out city gas distribution network in Arunachal Pradesh
description: Oil India Limited (OIL) and Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL), both Maharatna public sector enterprises, have signed a Joint Venture Agreement (JVA) to set up a City Gas Distribution (CGD) network in Arunachal Pradesh. The agreement was formalised o…
